abstract: New York City police detective shoots and kills robbery suspect who attacked detective and his partner with police radio during confrontation in East Village; incident marks second deadly police shooting in city in three days.
lead_paragraph: A police detective fired one shot, which hit a suspect in a robbery in the abdomen, the authorities said.

headline.main: Man, 24, Is Killed by Detective During Arrest in the East Village
headline.print_headline: Man, 24, Killed by Detective in Struggle During Arrest

snippet: A police detective fired one shot, which hit a suspect in a robbery in the abdomen, the authorities said.
